meanings.definition: A short-handled shovel with a wide, flat blade, used for sweeping up dust and dirt.
meanings.sent1: I used the dustpan to clean up the spilled flour on the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent2: Mom asked me to bring the dustpan to help her tidy up the garage.
meanings.sent3: The dustpan and broom danced together, making the cleaning task seem like a fun game.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a dustpan, sweeping away all the sadness in the room.
meanings.sent5: The bright red dustpan stood out against the dull gray of the concrete floor.

meanings.definition: A small, flat container with a handle, used for collecting dust and dirt swept up with a broom.
meanings.sent1: After sweeping the porch, she emptied the dustpan into the trash.
meanings.sent2: The dustpan was left outside, forgotten in the rush to finish cleaning.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to use the dustpan as a hat, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like a dustpan, gathering up all the joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The old, rusty dustpan had seen many years of hard work and cleaning.
